description: Ministry of Labour & Labouar Relations - Appointed Mr. P. Weerasekera as Arbitraotor for settle the dispute between Mrs. H. N. H. Hennayake and Ceylon Electricity Board - Appointed Mr. P. Nawaratna as the Arbitraotor for settle the dispute between Mr. S. de Silva & Dynagro (Pvt. Ltd. - Appointed Mr. S. M. S. Jayawardena as the arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. A. M. J. Atapattu and Sri Lanka Transport Board
